snippet: President Goodluck Jonathan directed top security officials to set up a special counterterrorism unit to fight the growing threat posed by Boko Haram.
abstract: Nigerian Pres Goodluck Jonathan declares a state of emergency in four states following a spate of deadly attacks by a radical Muslim sect Boko Haram that has claimed dozens of lives; Jonathan also orders the closing of international borders near the affected areas.
lead_paragraph: President Goodluck Jonathan directed top security officials to set up a special counterterrorism unit to fight the growing threat posed by Boko Haram.

headline.seo: Boko Haram Attacks Force Emergency in 4 Nigeria States
